hero.title: Preserving Tradition, Building Community
hero.subtitle: Join us in our mission to maintain our sacred temple and serve our community through spiritual guidance and charitable work.

about.title: Our Sacred Mission
about.description1: Founded in 1985, Divine Temple has been a pillar of spiritual guidance and community service. Our non-profit organization works tirelessly to preserve our ancient traditions while adapting to serve the evolving needs of our community.
about.description2: We believe in the power of faith to transform lives and communities. Through our various programs, charitable initiatives, and regular ceremonies, we strive to create a space where everyone can find peace, purpose, and belonging.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.text: To create a harmonious society through spiritual wisdom and compassionate service.

values.title: Our Values
values.text: Compassion, integrity, devotion, community, and selfless service.
